Agents.Base

Class BaseAgent<PerceptionsType extends BasePerceptions,ActionType extends BaseAction>

  • java.lang.Object
    • Agents.Base.BaseAgent<PerceptionsType,ActionType>
  • Type Parameters:
    PerceptionsType - Type of perceptions the agent receive
    ActionType - Type of action the agent performs
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Agent
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    HumanAgent, ZombieAgent

    public abstract class BaseAgent<PerceptionsType extends BasePerceptions,ActionType extends BaseAction>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Agent
    Base class for the agents classes of the zombie epidemic environment

                                 int speed,
                                 java.util.Collection<java.awt.geom.Line2D> walls,
                                 ActionType action)
        Auxiliary function that the inherited classes can use to perform a random move (normally it should be used when the agent doesn't perceive any enemy)
        Parameters:
        maxRotationDegrees - Range of degrees of deviation respect current direction
        speed - Speed of the agent
        walls - Walls perceived
        action - Action object to modify

      • getDistance

        protected double getDistance(java.awt.geom.Point2D position)
        Calculate the distance between a position and the agent. NOTE: It is supposed that the agent's position is the origin of coordinates
        Parameters:
        position - the point whose distance from the agent has to be calculated
        Returns:
        The distance between the agent and the position
